Title: In Control
Writer: Joseph Weisberg (creator), Joel Fields, Joseph Weisberg, Sneha Koorse (staff writer), Mike Batistick (staff writer)
Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Maximiliano HernÃ¡ndez, Holly Taylor
Plot: After President Reagan is nearly assassinated events quickly start to spin out of control. The FBI wonders if the KGB is somehow behind it; the KGB worry that they will be blamed for it and possibly result in war.
